name: Indyeva Oriana II Top - Women's
description:
Made using a cooling and comfy blend of recycled polyester and spandex, the Oriana can’t wait for summer.Recycled polyester and spandex blend dries quickly and wicks moisture.Sleeves adjust with snap tabs.Laser cut and bonded hem keeps weight to a minimum.Laser cut vent detail on sides adds breathability.UPF 30+ UV protection.Length is 70cm in front, 71cm in back.

        Sustainability





.st0{stroke:#333;stroke-width:.79;stroke-miterlimit:10}








                      Recycled content
